info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 12:21PM MDT until March 18 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northwestern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 215 PM MDT.
* At 1219 PM MDT, blowing dust was reported to have stopped traffic on US Highway 82 between Artesia and Hope.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Trained Spotter.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* US Highway 82 near Hope, other local roads in northwestern Eddy County.
Locations impacted include... Hope.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 2:15 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 2:15 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 2:15 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 2:15 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
